subject: Chicago Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Fighting off a competitor in the final half mile, Sammy Wanjiru of Kenya won the race for the second year in a row. Liliya Shobukhova of Russia won the women’s race.
snippet: Fighting off a competitor in the final half mile, Sammy Wanjiru of Kenya won the race for the second year in a row. Liliya Shobukhova of Russia won the women’s race.
